name: eAccelerator
body:
eAccelerator is a fast and simple bytecode cache for PHP. It stores the bytecode in shared memory (which is.. ahem.. shared across the processes) and retrieves this precompiled bytecode when needed, thus avoiding parsing and compiling stages for each cached file.

##eAccelerator is dead, long live eAccelerator!

The eAccelerator project was never actively developed and it's apparently become orphaned about around 2010.
But the code still works and hence we've decided to revive the project to share the results of our work with other people and get some feedback in the process.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
